original_title: Laugh Now, Think Later: Shadoe Stevens & The History of Fred Rated
overview: 94 minute semi-documentary special about history of mind control and "public relations," as created by Edgar Bernays, the life of Shadoe Stevens and the history of the "Fred Rated" series of television commercials.
tagline: Shaditude, Bludgeon Advertising, and Mind Control.
title: Laugh Now, Think Later: Shadoe Stevens & The History of Fred Rated
